Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Irethoreru(?) born of Asetkheb with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an incised adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the leg section is inscribed with eight rows of blue painted hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Condition: fair - patches of the surface missing
